article.title: Northrop to Provide IT Support in Korea
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded an $8,973,337 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of information technology services. Work will be performed in Korea, with an estimated completion date of July 31, 2015. Sixteen bids were solicited, with three bids received. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Yongsan Garrison, Korea, is the contracting activity.
